title: Elodhiir
subtitle: The immortal body capturing men of the ashlands

Peoples: The Elodhiir hold within them the great pwer of Trancendessance, the power to leek parts of their conciousness into unclaimed vessels, with training this can go even beyond humanoids, and ancestors, even to the very beasts of the land.
Geography: Due to their fear of fire, they are most at home in lands of ash, devoid of burnable organic material.
